title: Introduction to Java Programming
introduction: Java is a versatile and widely-used programming language known for its platform independence and strong community support. Learning Java provides a solid foundation for various career paths in software development.
details: Java is used to build a wide range of applications, from web and mobile to enterprise-level software. It follows an object-oriented programming paradigm and includes features like garbage collection, multithreading, and exception handling. Learning Java involves understanding syntax, data types, control flow, and object-oriented principles.
